ann:
&c&l Chimera不再更新!
&e&l*&4&l 2023/11/19 Chimera 停止更新公告
&c&l--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
&c&l感謝您的支持與下載,經過兩個月的停滯 chimera 將於2023/11/19 13:45 (GMT+8)過後 "永久"停止更新
&c&lThank you for your support and downloads. After two months of rest, Chimera will "no longer updates" after 13:45 on 2023/11/19 (GMT+8).
&c&l多謝你嘅支持同下載。經過兩個月嘅休息後，Chimera 將於2023年11月19日13:45 (GMT+8)之後「唔再更新」。
&c&l--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
detail:
&b 1. Because "Mark Dungeon Star Mob" may let you get ban, So For your account security,&4&lSince version v0.0.5+ Chimera no longer provides "Mark Dungeon Star Mob"
&b 2. Because the program is optimized, it may cause some bugs, if you find any bugs, please report
&b 3. <Chimera 2> Comming Soon, But it maybe not free ,Because &4&l Don't forget that money can be earn, but you can earn more if u  without conscience.
